item.description:
At this month's WordPress meetup, we'll be talking about web typography. This will include a basic history of typography on the web and the recent rapid development of web fonts. We'll review new techniques and services for using web fonts and how they can be integrated into WordPress. We'll then talk a bit about choosing the best web font for your sites.

This is a beginner-friendly session, so join us at Skytemple Design, May 30th at 7pm!

View recaps of past meetups on our website, and listen for announcements via twitter, @valleysummit.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Web Typography
